item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Friday, December 20, 2024 at 2:45 AM UTC
item.description:
1. How do you do, fellow web developers? A growing disconnect (73 points | 46 comments)

3. Elixir v1.18 released: type checking of function calls, Language Server listeners, built-in JSON, and ExUnit improvements (26 points | 2 comments)

5. Visitor Pattern Considered Pointless - Use Pattern Switches Instead (2021) (5 points | 2 comments)
6. Building Python tools with a one-shot prompt using uv run and Claude Projects (5 points | 2 comments)
7. The RAM myth (20 points | 1 comment)
8. grype: A vulnerability scanner for container images and filesystems (8 points | 3 comments)
9. Go advanced concurrency patterns: unlimited buffer channels (15 points | 2 comments)
10. Java in the Small (36 points | 19 comments)
11. A Survey Of System Languages (2024) (99 points | 98 comments)

14. Top Python Web Development Frameworks in 2025 (2 points | no comments)

16. Announcing NetBSD 10.1 (Dec 16, 2024) (18 points | 1 comment)
17. Shared-nothing Design - Seastar (5 points | 1 comment)
18. Why do developers love clean code but hate writing documentation? (2 points | 11 comments)
19. Why We’re Moving to a Source Available License (14 points | 36 comments)
20. Piccolo OS, a small multitasking OS for the Raspberry Pi Pico (21 points | no comments)
21. The Better Daemons Of Our Profession (9 points | 3 comments)
22. iptables interactive scheme (6 points | 1 comment)

25. Home Manager: dotfiles management (24 points | 31 comments)
